title: ISheetMetalFeatureData.FixedReference
description: Gets or sets the fixed face or edge for this sheet metal feature.
remarks:
To access the fixed reference of a sheet metal feature in sheet metal models created in SOLIDWORKS 2013 or later, follow the examples of
IModelDocExtension::GetTemplateSheetMetal
.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.

examples.title: Get Fixed Face of Sheet Metal Part (VBA)
